22 #include "mutation++.h"
23 #include <catch.hpp>
24 
25 using namespace Mutation;
26 using namespace Catch;
27 
32 TEST_CASE("Test exception classes", "[exceptions]"
33 )
34 {
35  SECTION("Error (base class)") {
36  Error error = Error("type")("info1", "value") << "message";
37  error("info2", 37);
38  error.addExtraInfo("info3", 'a');
39  CHECK(error.getExtraInfo("info1") == "value");
40  CHECK(error.getExtraInfo("info2") == "37");
41  CHECK(error.getExtraInfo("info3") == "a");
42  CHECK(error.getExtraInfo("bla") == "");
43 
44  CHECK(
45  std::string(error.what()) ==
46  "\nM++ error: type.\ninfo1: value\ninfo2: 37\ninfo3: a\nmessage\n"
47  );
48 
49  CHECK_THROWS_AS(throw Error("type"), Error);
50  }
51 
52  SECTION("FileNotFoundError") {
53  FileNotFoundError error = FileNotFoundError("name") << "message";
54  CHECK(error.getExtraInfo("file") == "name");
55  CHECK(error.file() == "name");
56 
57  CHECK(
58  std::string(error.what()) ==
59  (Error("file not found")("file", "name") << "message").what()
60  );
61 
62  CHECK_THROWS_AS(throw FileNotFoundError("") << "", Error);
63  CHECK_THROWS_AS(throw FileNotFoundError("") << "", FileNotFoundError);
64  }
65 
66  SECTION("FileParseError") {
67  FileParseError error = FileParseError("name", 18) << "message";
68  CHECK(error.getExtraInfo("file") == "name");
69  CHECK(error.file() == "name");
70  CHECK(error.getExtraInfo("line") == "18");
71  CHECK(error.line() == "18");
72 
73  CHECK(
74  std::string(error.what()) ==
75  (Error("error parsing file")("file", "name")("line", 18) << "message").what()
76  );
77 
78  CHECK_THROWS_AS(throw FileParseError("", 0) << "", Error);
79  CHECK_THROWS_AS(throw FileParseError("", 0) << "", FileParseError);
80  }
81 
82  SECTION("InvalidInputError") {
83  InvalidInputError error = InvalidInputError("input", 37) << "message";
84  CHECK(error.getExtraInfo("input") == "input = 37");
85  CHECK(error.inputName() == "input");
86  CHECK(error.inputValue() == "37");
87 
88  CHECK(
89  std::string(error.what()) ==
90  (Error("invalid input")("input", "input = 37") << "message").what()
91  );
92 
93  CHECK_THROWS_AS(throw InvalidInputError("", 0) << "", Error);
94  CHECK_THROWS_AS(throw InvalidInputError("", 0) << "", InvalidInputError);
95  }
96 
97  SECTION("LogicError") {
98  std::stringstream ss;
99  LogicError error = LogicError() << "message"; ss << __LINE__;
100  CHECK(error.getExtraInfo("file") == __FILE__);
101  CHECK(error.file() == __FILE__);
102  CHECK(error.getExtraInfo("line") == ss.str());
103  CHECK(error.line() == ss.str());
104 
105  CHECK(
106  std::string(error.what()) ==
107  (Error("logic error")("file", __FILE__)("line", ss.str()) << "message").what()
108  );
109 
110  CHECK_THROWS_AS(throw LogicError() << "", Error);
111  CHECK_THROWS_AS(throw LogicError() << "", LogicError);
112  }
113 
114  SECTION("NotImplementedError") {
115  std::stringstream ss;
116  NotImplementedError error = NotImplementedError("function") << "message"; ss << __LINE__;
117  CHECK(error.getExtraInfo("file") == __FILE__);
118  CHECK(error.file() == __FILE__);
119  CHECK(error.getExtraInfo("line") == ss.str());
120  CHECK(error.line() == ss.str());
121  CHECK(error.getExtraInfo("function") == "function");
122  CHECK(error.function() == "function");
123 
124  CHECK(
125  std::string(error.what()) ==
126  (Error("function not implemented")("function", "function")
127  ("file", __FILE__)("line", ss.str()) << "message").what()
128  );
129 
130  CHECK_THROWS_AS(throw NotImplementedError("") << "", Error);
131  CHECK_THROWS_AS(throw NotImplementedError("") << "", NotImplementedError);
132  }
133 }
